title: Karsten Lucke Type Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Karsten Luecke Type Foundry**

or KLTF is [Karsten Luecke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karsten%20Luecke). Typefaces: Litteratra, Tiptoe.

[http://www.kltf.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215513/http:/www.kltf.de/ "http://www.kltf.de")
author: k.l.
